text: Motion
Congrats on finishing the drama!

......
Thanks, Meguru-chan...

...You see, because of the drama job,
I missed out on a lot of Illumination STARS jobs.

So, Hiori-chan and Meguru-chan,
Thank so much for all your hard work...

That's what we were talking about originally,
and It's not just Mano, right?

Right! It can happen with Hiori or me as well,
so please take care of things when i get busy too.
Motion
And then there's ────

The end of spring school year which means
──── summer is coming!
You must be feeling that high tension.
Right, of course!

I was wondering if we might get a
new job or get to meet someone new...!

Fufu. Well, there's always something
new when it comes to work.
Yeah...

...Whether it be in the spring, summer──
Or any other time of the year...

Right! There are always new encounters!
And there are also goodbyes!
Motion

......
Let's see what kind of jobs will come up next...
What kind of work do you want to do?
Motion

......I'd love to work with
Hiori-chan and Meguru-chan...
Motion
Me too / I'm the same way!
